Summary: triangle rounded edges, three white lights red light on bottom ctr
divs: sighting detailsstationary triangle object, height about 800-1000' size 200-300' in length aprox. edges of triangle were rounded w\ three white lights. redish light on center of bottom. no noise, no movement for at least four min.time 8:15 pm driving home from unionville town ctr. stoped at a quite intersection and watched and listened as it was then almost directly overhead. cross roads of rt162 and brandwine creek road.no problem if you would like drawing
